Hi. I'm Dom!

Welcome to my website. I am a Web Designer & Developer that has spent the last 7 years building exciting digital experiences.

Start a Project

Services

  • Web Design

    As a website designer I always use the responsive or fluid approach to make sure your website has a similar look and feel across all devices, from smartphones to desktops. I then combine it with the best practices in UX Design enabling your website to function exactly as you expect.

  • Web Development

    My main area of expertise lies within front-end development but can also offer back-end development to deliver any web functionalities to suit all your project needs. This could be by building a brand new website or perhaps by adding extra features to an exiting one.

  • SEO & Performance

    My main area of expertise lies within front-end development but can also offer back-end development to deliver any web functionalities to suit all your project needs. This could be by building a brand new website or perhaps by adding extra features to an exiting one.

  • Photography

    My main area of expertise lies within front-end development but can also offer back-end development to deliver any web functionalities to suit all your project needs. This could be by building a brand new website or perhaps by adding extra features to an exiting one.
